title: E-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: PLC-Based Collective Efficacy for Strengthening Math Teachers’ Collaborative Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of primary mathematics fundamentals and classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can implement at least three effective communication strategies with peer teachers using a PLC-based collaborative learning model
Through reflective dialogue, learners can identify at least two lesson improvement points and develop action plans
Learners can design a resource-sharing system to enhance collective efficacy and develop at least one learner-tailored intervention strategy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
